recipe.title: Creamy Polenta
ingredients: 2 cups polenta (not quick-cooking) or yellow cornmeal (10 ounces)
instructions: Bring water to a boil with salt in a 4-quart heavy pot, then add polenta in a thin stream, whisking. Cook over moderate heat, whisking, 2 minutes. Reduce heat to low and simmer polenta, covered, stirring for 1 minute after every 10 minutes of cooking, 45 minutes total. Remove from heat and serve warm.
